mapper.sql: m.user_id as id, m.user_name as name, m.user_birthday as birthday, m.user_salary as salary
mapper.insert: insert into s_user (user_id, user_name, user_birthday, user_salary) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into s_user
user_id,
user_name,
user_birthday,
user_salary,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update s_user
user_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
user_salary = #{salary,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where user_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
